condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section I; Para A.1 | Description :The Borrower shall maintain the IWG during Projectimplementation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section I; Para A.2 | Description :The APST shall be responsible for the overall Project management,including financial and procurement management and other Project-related tasks, in accordance with the Project Operations Manual. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section II; Para A.1 | Description :The Borrower shall monitor and evaluate the progress of theProject and prepare Project Reports (annual) on the basis of indicatorsagreed with the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section II; Para B.1 | Description :The Borrower shall implement an automated accounting andreporting software system at APST to support Project accounting and automatically generate periodic financial reports. | Due Date:30-Apr-2009

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section II; Para B.2 | Description :The Borrower shall, through the APST, maintain a financialmanagement system in accordance with the provisions of Section 5.09 of the General Conditions | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section II; Para B.3 | Description :The Borrower shall, through the APST, prepare and furnish to theBank not later than 45 days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports of each quarter | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section II; Para B.4 | Description :The Borrower shall have its Financial Statements audited inaccordance with the provisions of Section 5.09 (b) of the General Conditions. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section II; Para B.4 | Description :The audited Financial Statements for each fiscal year shall befurnished to the Bank not later than six months after the end of such period. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section IV, Para B.1.(b) | Description :Category (1) expenditures for Part 2(c) is possible onlyafter the establishment of the PFMS countrywide network connections (before ICB contract signatures). | Due Date :01-Jan-2014
